column5: Place is lake-front! Only minutes from Denton's art, culture and phenomenal music scene. 55 min from Dallas. GREAT lake view of moon and sunrises. PVT fenced courtyard. Incl: Use of kayaks  Inside: Queen,memory foam/gel bed (slightly firm), full bathroom, limited kitchen (mini fridge, microwave, Keurig, outdoor grill) Good for cpls, solo, business folk, families/kids/pets Summer: Sea Doo's are avbl to rent.
